programme.title: Go for it
programme.desc: Two men meet in a strange situation and end up being mistaken first for robbers, then for Secret Service agents.

programme.title: The Bloodstained Shadow
programme.desc: The body of a schoolgirl is found in a meadow. The murderer is never caught, and years later, a young man named Stefano returns to the island and is reunited with his brother, the local priest.

programme.title: Ready to fight
programme.desc: Deceit, betrayal, and treachery unfold in the dangerous underworld of currency smugglers.

programme.title: Poker in bed
programme.desc: Love, rivalry, and high-stakes games mix in a witty tale of ambition and seduction

programme.title: Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure
programme.desc: Alan, a gambler, drains his uncle's savings and takes refuge on Charlie's boat, on a cruise. They shipwreck on an island, defend a tribe from pirates and discover a Japanese fort with treasure. In the end, the money turns out to be fake and Alan forgets a diamond idol, later exhibited in a museum where they are both hired as labourers.

programme.title: Come niente
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Greta and 11-year-old Caterina, spend the summer with their grandfather Franco, who survived a major earthquake in central Italy.

programme.title: A Sky Full of Stars for a Roof
programme.desc: Two drifters meet and soon become travelling companions. But one of them, Tim (Gemma), is being chased by a crazed killer and his band of gunmen to settle an old score. The two (Adore being the other) are chased through the west, encountering scrape after scrape until the killers catch up and the score is settled for good.

programme.title: Shoot First, Die Later
programme.desc: Domenico Malacarne is a police commissioner colluding with the criminal underworld, which takes advantage of his corrupt dealings to obtain lavish earnings. Gradually, however, he realises that the mafia is going too far, and begins to hinder his operations, antagonising them. When his fianc√©e is killed, Domenico knows it is a scam. But he is nevertheless determined to declare his personal war!

programme.title: Hell's Fever
programme.desc: During the Christmas season, a group of students robs a large sum of money and organises an escape through a large snowy forest. That place, however, is known as the realm of the beast. It will only be the beginning of the terrible nightmare that awaits them.

programme.title: Poker in bed
programme.desc: Love, rivalry, and high-stakes games mix in a witty tale of ambition and seduction
